title: Drawing, "Furniture Designs, Modern", early 20th century
medium: Graphite, red pencil on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamps: Stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/501 MADISON AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower margin: W. AND J. SLOANE MODERN UPHOLSTERY LINE FALL 1935; at upper left: 11/12[each circled] Inscribed in graphite with design numbers throughout
description: 3 sectional chair pieces, 1 couch with end tables, 1 ottoman Deskey numbers in reading from upper left horizontally: 9220 S., 9221, 9222, 9223, 9224

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Furniture Designs, Modern", early 20th century.
early 20th century. Graphite, red pencil on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-179.
